MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL36 postcode area of Tywyn. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:46pm. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by broken equipment on the overhead network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 2am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:27pm on 23rd December 2020
